rows.label: qst720401_msg0001
rows.name: Ivan, are you here?

rows.label: qst720401_msg0003
rows.name: Th-this is Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0004
rows.name: J-just a sec... munch munch munch...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0005
rows.name: ！？　[ML:Dash ][ML:Dash ]！！！！

rows.label: qst720401_msg0006
rows.name: Hey, his face is turning blue!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0007
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I-it hurts...!
It's stuck in my throat!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0008
rows.name: Here! Drink some water!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0009
rows.name: *Gulp gulp gulp...*

rows.label: qst720401_msg0010
rows.name: Aaah...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0011
rows.name: Phew...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0012
rows.name:
Good, he seems to have calmed down.
The color's back in his face.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0013
rows.name:
I don't know who you are,
but you saved my life! Thank you!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0014
rows.name: You're exaggerating...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0015
rows.name:
Not at all.
I'd give you something to thank you,
but with the supply shortage...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0016
rows.name:
Ivaaaan. You were sneaking snacks again,
weren't you?

rows.label: qst720401_msg0017
rows.name:
Adel-sama!
I would never do such a thing!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0018
rows.name:
Then what were you doing here,
munching away?

rows.label: qst720401_msg0019
rows.name: I was disposing of spoiled food supplies.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0020
rows.name:
Wait! By spoiled, you mean rotten?
Are you okay after eating that?

rows.label: qst720401_msg0021
rows.name:
Thank you for worrying.
I just happen to have a strong stomach.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0022
rows.name:
But I can't possibly serve that to
the members of the resistance.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0023
rows.name: I guess... that makes sense.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0024
rows.name:
That's why, as a combination of quality
control and waste disposal, I was
responsibly disposing of it myself.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0025
rows.name:
And if I could also quiet my rumbling
stomach at the same time, well, that's
killing three birds with one stone.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0026
rows.name:
Okay, okay, I get it.
I know you're a diligent person.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0027
rows.name:
I'll accept that you were just in
the middle of "waste disposal"
a minute ago.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0028
rows.name:
Tell me about the current
food supply situation.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0029
rows.name: Right away.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0030
rows.name:
The truth is, since word of Adel-sama's
return, the number of soldiers joining
up has increased...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0031
rows.name:
We've organized food-gathering teams
and sent them out, but the truth is
we're short-staffed.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0032
rows.name: Then I'm largely responsible for that.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0033
rows.name:
Yeah. We should help
gather supplies, too.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0034
rows.name:
I want to fix this before
His Majesty gets back, so I'll help too.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0035
rows.name: E-everyone, thank you so much!

rows.label: qst720401_msg0036
rows.name:
Here's a list of the ingredients
we need right away.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0037
rows.name:
Two Grimdark Crabs,
four portions of Feris Beastmeat...

rows.label: qst720401_msg0038
rows.name:
Two large Lactonuts, and six
measures of Weeping Flour...
That seems easily doable.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0039
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I should probably gather
an extra one of each.

rows.label: qst720401_msg0040
rows.name: Then let's get going and find them.
